# OranAI API Documentation

> OranAI API is a unified gateway service for accessing various AI model APIs.

## Base URL

https://models.photog.art

## Authentication

All API requests require authentication via Bearer token in the Authorization header:

```
Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY
```

## Available Endpoints

### Chat Completions
- POST /v1/chat/completions - Generate chat completions

### Image Generation
- POST /v1/images/generations - Generate images from text prompts

### Embeddings
- POST /v1/embeddings - Generate text embeddings

### Models
- GET /v1/models - List available models

## Response Format

All responses are returned in JSON format with the following structure:

```json
{
  "id": "chatcmpl-xxx",
  "object": "chat.completion",
  "created": 1234567890,
  "model": "gpt-4",
  "choices": [...],
  "usage": {...}
}
```

## Error Handling

Errors follow standard HTTP status codes:
- 400: Bad Request
- 401: Unauthorized
- 429: Rate Limited
- 500: Internal Server Error

## Rate Limits

Rate limits vary by subscription tier. Check your dashboard for current limits.

## Contact

For support, visit: https://models.photog.art/support
